Contributing

Notes on contributing and Pull Requests (PRs):

As usual, I will prioritize PRs which serve the greater good, or are critical.

If I don't accept a PR, it means either:

  • I am currently working on the same thing, or
  • It doesn't serve greater good (perhaps only applies to you or, say, 5% of the users), or
  • It conflicts with existing functionalities

As of now, some of the most wanted features are:

  • AJAX (or promise objects)
  • Lazy loading

When working on a PR, please set your TAB to be 4 spaces (ASCII 32).

Useful Pull Requests

Here are some PRs contributed by various great developers, but not included in the project due to reasons above.

  • #151 Using angular in itemlabels (tooltips) - compile directive added and used
  • #127 Customize output model properties, single item behavior, control disabled, filter patch, etc.
  • #95 Add custom "more" label callback
  • #78 Allow hidden items
  • #57 Add ability to change label divider
